title: Friendlyy: A Real-Time Chat Application
description: Real-time chat app with PERN stack, Redis caching, and Socket.IO for live communication, featuring secure login and intuitive UI.

title: DocuGuard: Secure Cloud-Native Document Management System
description: Secure cloud-native document management system using microservices, Kubernetes, Docker, and Node.js, with JWT integration for security.

title: EventHub Platform Development
description: Real-time platform with Google Maps integration, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, and JWT for enhanced security and efficiency in event management.

title: Economease: Simplify Your Finances, Amplify Your Savings
description: MERN stack budget management app with secure authentication, transaction recording, interactive financial reporting, and Redux for state management.

title: Serverless Blog Platform Development
description: AWS Lambda-based blog platform with API Gateway, DynamoDB, IAM, and Serverless Framework for scalable, cost-effective web app deployment and management.
